my life view of 2009

Since its coming to the end of 2009 i tought i sould tell yous how my life was like. Well there has been a few ups and down but i gt there. I was at college right up to the summer and i da to move down to gateshead because of this girl and we had a bby together. But things were not working out so i moved bak up scotland. I have made new m8s and lots some but i would nt be here with out my m8s. I am hoping in 2010 it be a good year to rember and start fresh. I say that every year and it dose not seem to work but hey. 2010 a new degad (can not spell) witch its a good time to start again. So that was a brief view of my life in 2009 lets hope my view will be better next year if i am still on here. So to everyone who read this have a happy xmas and a very happy new year, and thanks again to all my m8s
